channel.title: CVE Feed for GNOME -- NetworkManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GNOME -- NetworkManager

item.title: CVE-2012-1096|2024-08-06T18:45:27.252Z -- gnome -- networkmanager
item.description: NetworkManager 0.9 and earlier allows local users to use other users' certificates or private keys when making a connection via the file path when adding a new connection.
